id: T1 large Cherry - Removal, root damage to Gledhow Manor. T2 large self seeded Cherry (Prunus sp.) - Total removal of the tree and manual excavation of the roots causing damage. Tree has significantly outgrown its position; due to the tree being situated within two to three meters of Gledhow Manor, and four meters from the houses off Redhouse Lane. This will allow more light into the lower canopy in which smaller Malus, small Acer or large shrub species (with less pervasive roots) could be planted in the existing hedge; at a maximum height of 4-6 m after 10 years.
addr: Gledhow Manor 350 Gledhow Lane Gledhow Leeds LS7 4NH
